$UMC Anyone any idea why it’s opened with such a huge drop?

Add $UMC $ABT $DFS $GS and $MAR at the open (MOO).

Stop losses are calculated at the end of the day to avoid intra-day volatility. Exit would be the following morning at the market (MOO).

links.title: Why United Microelectronics Stock Jumped Today
links.description: Shares of United Microelectronics were up by 10% as of 3 p.m. EDT today, after the company said it expects to settle a criminal lawsuit soon. The U.S. Department of Justice (DOJ) had filed the lawsuit in 2018 alleging that the company was part of a conspiracy to steal trade secrets from Micron Technology (NASDAQ: MU) .
